title: Billing
manageSubscription: Manage your subscription plan and billing
paymentMethodsDescription: Manage your payment methods and billing preferences
noPaymentMethodsDescription: Add a payment method to manage your subscription
billingHistoryDescription: Download invoices and view payment history
noInvoicesDescription: Your billing history will appear here once you have an active subscription.

plans.title: Available Plans
plans.description: Choose the plan that fits your needs
plans.trialInfo: All plans include a 14-day free trial. Cancel anytime.

usage.title: Usage This Month
usage.trackUsage: Track your current usage against plan limits
usage.approachingLimit: You're approaching your limit. Consider upgrading your plan.

portal.title: Customer Portal
portal.description: Manage your subscription and payment details

alerts.paymentFailedDescription: Your payment method was declined. Please update your details to maintain service.
alerts.paymentIssueDescription: Your payment method failed. Please update your billing information to continue using the service.

errors.upgradeFailedDescription: Unable to process upgrade. Please try again.
errors.portalFailedDescription: Unable to access billing portal. Please try again.
errors.setupFailed: Failed to initialize payment method setup
errors.setDefaultFailed: Failed to update default payment method
errors.changePlanFailed: Failed to change plan. Please try again.
errors.cancelFailed: Failed to cancel subscription. Please try again.
errors.reactivateFailed: Failed to reactivate subscription. Please try again.

success.cancelledImmediate: Your subscription has been cancelled immediately.
success.cancelledPeriodEnd: Your subscription will be cancelled at the end of the current billing period.
success.reactivatedDescription: Your subscription has been successfully reactivated.

paymentMethod.stripeIntegration: Integration with Stripe Elements would go here to collect payment method details securely.
paymentMethod.updateDescription: Update the expiry date for your card
paymentMethod.removeDescription: Are you sure you want to remove this payment method? This action cannot be undone.
paymentMethod.cannotRemoveDefault: You cannot remove your default payment method. Set another method as default first.

subscription.noActiveDescription: Choose a plan to get started with ADSapp
subscription.cancelDescription: We're sorry to see you go. Please let us know why you're cancelling.
subscription.feedbackPlaceholder: Help us improve by sharing your feedback...

analytics.title: Billing Analytics
analytics.description: Track revenue, subscriptions, and payment performance
analytics.churnDescription: Monitor customer retention and churn patterns
analytics.highChurnMessage: Your churn rate of {rate} is above the recommended threshold of 5%. Consider implementing retention strategies to improve customer satisfaction.
analytics.planBreakdown: Revenue and subscription breakdown by plan
analytics.overageDescription: Track usage-based billing and overage charges
analytics.lifetimeDescription: Average customer lifetime and value metrics
